mapper.select: /* S_BBS_SETTING */ SELECT 'id_' || (ROWNUM-1) AS "id" , A.BBS_SETTING_ID , A.MODULE_CODE , A.SEQ , A.CATEGORY_CODE , A.CATEGORY_NAME , A.UP_CATEGORY_CODE , A.DESCRIPTION , A.USE_YN , COMM_UTIL_PKG.comm_code_attr('MODULE', A.MODULE_CODE, 'NAME', #{LANG_CODE}) AS MODULE_NAME FROM BBS_SETTING A WHERE A.MODULE_CODE = #{MODULE_CODE} ORDER BY A.SEQ ASC

/* S_BBS_CATEGORY */ SELECT 'id_' || (ROWNUM-1) AS "id" , LEVEL-1 AS "indent" , SUBSTR( SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(ROWNUM, '_') , (INSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(ROWNUM, '_'), '_', -1, 2)+1) , (INSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(ROWNUM, '_'), '_', -1) - (INSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(ROWNUM, '_'), '_', -1, 2)+1)) ) -1 AS "parent" , A.CATEGORY_CODE , COMM_UTIL_PKG.lang(A.CATEGORY_NAME, #{LANG_CODE}) as CATEGORY_NAME FROM BBS_SETTING A WHERE A.USE_YN = '1' AND A.MODULE_CODE = #{MODULE_CODE} START WITH A.UP_CATEGORY_CODE IS null CONNECT BY PRIOR A.CATEGORY_CODE = A.UP_CATEGORY_CODE ORDER SIBLINGS BY A.SEQ

/* S_BBS_BOARD_ONE */ SELECT A.BBS_BOARD_ID , A.MODULE_CODE , A.CATEGORY_CODE , COMM_UTIL_PKG.lang(B.CATEGORY_NAME, #{LANG_CODE}) as CATEGORY_NAME , A.OPEN_YN , A.BOARD_NO , A.TITLE , A.BOARD_CONTENTS FROM BBS_BOARD A LEFT JOIN BBS_SETTING B ON (A.CATEGORY_CODE = B.CATEGORY_CODE AND A.MODULE_CODE = B.MODULE_CODE) WHERE A.BBS_BOARD_ID = #{BBS_BOARD_ID} AND A.MODULE_CODE = #{MODULE_CODE}
